urls.title: Donate to Giving Tuesday 2022
urls.description: Your #GivingTuesday gift — doubled! Contribute now to protect monarch butterflies and their homes in California state parks.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text:
🔔 LAST CHANCE 🔔 Only a few hours remain to protect monarch butterflies in state parks this #GivingTuesday. Donate today, and your gift will be DOUBLED by our friends at @united. 🦋 https://t.co/elxBbYbQxZ 🦋 

#CalparksMonarchs https://t.co/Ka2ECc5e77

data.text: I don't know why they offer tickets through 3rd party airlines if they can't process it correctly. This is not the first time for this kind of delay. Also, I did not get an alert when my flight got canceled. Note to self: Don't ever buy @united airlines ticket.

data.text: I had a horrible experience with @united yet again. I had to stand for 2 hours (with 23 month old) at the ticket counter while they tried to resolve an issue with my ticket because  of which Air canada couldn't print my ticket.

data.text: @LouFarinaccio @DJKinzelman @MikeSpagnuoloUA @scarnes1978 @united Thank you Lou!! You , Shaun and David made it EXTRA special by coming over to have cake! 🙌
